title: Phantom Kid in the World of American Comics - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Martial Arts   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Aliens   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Magic   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Thieves   Weak to Strong
author: Creek And Fish   溪坳与鱼
description:
He is a bastard who tries to trample all American police under his feet-GCPD.

He is like the 21st century Robin Hood, who can easily disguise himself as the person you are most familiar with. We are not even sure whether he is a “he” or a  “she”-CIA

We may have to spend a lifetime to hunt him down, but in the end, it is mostly useless-FBI 

The magician under the moonlight of. His risk assessment… is very complicated, but we can at least be sure that he is much more skilled than most members of the Avengers-SHIELD,

He is our dream lover-Female fans.

“In this world, treasures, and beauties are the most indispensable”- Mathison>
